value.title: DAX Fridays! #183: How to deal with multiple dates in Power BI
value.excerpt: So you have order date, shipped date, required date....and only one calendar. How do you manage that in power bi and DAX? value.title: DAX Fridays! #197: Why you need to test your DAX measures in different contexts
value.excerpt: Always, always, always test your DAX measures in different contexts (different filtering scenarios) to make sure your DAX measure is calculating correctly. value.excerpt: Have you spent hours creating an excel model with Power Query and PowerPivot and you or your company has now decided to move to Power BI?
